text: Arra no o yurushi ga nakute wa, dare mo shinu koto wa dekinai. Sono sadame rareta jiki wa, toroku sa rete iru. Dare demo gense no hosho o motomeru mono ni wa, ware wa kore o atae, mata raise no hosho o motomeru mono ni mo, ware wa sore o ataeru. Ware wa kansha (shite tsukaeru)-sha ni wa, tadachini mukuirudearou
